channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Flyposting on shop front, 27th July
item.description:
Next to restaurant

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 5, Berners Street, Fitzrovia, Camden Town, City of Westminster

item.title: Fly Tipping Woolwich Road SE10, 27th July
item.description:
Continued domestic dumping outside new Chemist in Woolwich Road SE10. Likley to have come from addresses above shop - a recuuring issue. Also, it appears that commercial bins have suddenly become a permanent fixture outside the commercial businesses here too. They onstruct the pavement and are a massive eyesore at what is a busy junction on view to everyone.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Trafalgar Road, East Greenwich, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Vandalism to pedestrian traffic lights, 27th July
item.description:
